name: For his hopes and dreams
description:
Controls

- Mouse        Move

- LMb             Grab Bullets

- w,up             Push Bullets upwards

- s, down       Push Bullets downwards

Tips : Try both kinds of controls! It's a different experience. By the way, the spaceship behavior is randomized each run.

This is a story of a star. One night, she made a friend, a very good friend. He dreams to become a spaceship pilot one day. Years later, he finally got a chance to take a pilot exam. The star is worried that he may fail. "He needs my help" the star says, as she floats into his exam.

What would happen? How well he flies is beyond your control, what would come is also out of control, but deep down, she knows that his dreams and hopes are all in her hands.

"I'm gonna make him the best pilot in the universe!"

A game by CJ Tsai
